TELEMETRY REF HLTH_CHECK_PING BIG_ENDIAN "Report a particular entry on or off"
    <%=render "_ref_tlm_evr_hdr.txt", locals: {id: 365} %>

    APPEND_ITEM ENABLED 32 UINT "If health pinging is enabled for a particular entry"
        STATE HEALTH_PING_DISABLED 0
        STATE HEALTH_PING_ENABLED 1
    APPEND_ITEM ENTRY_LENGTH 16 UINT "Length of String Arg"
    APPEND_ITEM ENTRY 0 STRING "The entry passing the warning level"

    ITEM MESSAGE 0 0 DERIVED "Formatted String for Argument"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf("Health checking set to %s for %s" , packet.read('enabled') , packet.read('entry') )
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
      META FORMAT_STRING "Health checking set to %s for %s"
      META ARGS enabled entry 
    ITEM EVR_SEVERITY 0 0 DERIVED "Severity"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf('ACTIVITY_HI')
